cause.description:
The rainforest is slowly killing our earth. We must join together now to save our lives, and possibly, the lives of others.
1. Oil should be harvested
2. Trees should be cut down for lumber
3. Land should be used for farming
4. Stop tree-hugging counter-culture
5. Save the Earth
cause.mission: Stop the protection of the Rainforest
cause.name: Stop the Rainforest
